basics.name: Christian Joudon
basics.label: Recent Graduate
basics.summary: Recent Computer Science graduate with a background in Biochemistry and a passion for data engineering and front-end development. Adept at creating user-centered designs, developing scalable systems, and leveraging data-driven insights. Strong problem-solving skills with experience in programming, data visualization, and web technologies. Looking to apply analytical and creative abilities in a dynamic technical role.

bio: Recent Computer Science graduate with a background in Biochemistry and a passion for data engineering and front-end development. Adept at creating user-centered designs, developing scalable systems, and leveraging data-driven insights. Strong problem-solving skills with experience in programming, data visualization, and web technologies. Looking to apply analytical and creative abilities in a dynamic technical role.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Oahu
courses: Relevant Coursework: Data Structures, Machine Learning, Web Development, Database Systems

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Oahu

projects.name: Impact of Global Events on Market Trends
projects.description: Developed an interactive visualization system using ObservableHQ, Plotly.js, and D3.js to analyze the impact of global events on stock markets and GDP trends.
highlights: Implemented geospatial visualizations to display economic trends across different regions.
Designed interactive filtering features, allowing users to explore correlations between wars, pandemics, and market behaviors in real-time.

projects.name: Advanced SRT & Microphone Audio Visualization and Recording
projects.description: Created a Python-based system for streaming, recording, and visualizing audio from SRT streams and microphones.
highlights: Developed real-time waveform, FFT, and spectrogram visualizations using Matplotlib.
Integrated sounddevice, pyaudio, and FFmpeg for efficient audio processing and playback.

projects.name: UHnify: Transforming Campus Engagement
projects.description: Designed and implemented a student club management platform using MongoDB, Meteor.js, and React.js.
highlights: Developed a streamlined UI for browsing clubs, managing memberships, and viewing event calendars.
Built real-time synchronization features for updating event details and user interactions dynamically.

work.summary: Focused on screenplay development and assisted in creating marketing content for a real estate business. Gained experience in storytelling, structuring narratives, and presenting information clearly.
highlights: Wrote and refined a screenplay, developing skills in narrative structure and dialogue.
Assisted in creating content for a real estate business, including property descriptions and marketing materials.
Improved writing techniques through independent study and project work.

work.summary: Managed residential real estate projects, coordinating with architects and designers to ensure timely completion. Oversaw budget tracking and stakeholder communications, fostering efficiency and transparency.
highlights: Managed multiple real estate projects, ensuring adherence to budget and timelines.
Liaised with architects, builders, and designers to optimize project workflow.
Implemented efficient systems for budgeting and communication, improving transparency.

work.company: Various (Northside Grille, Blue Barn Gourmet, Sushi Girl, The Hanalei Dolphin, Healthy Hut)
work.summary: Developed strong interpersonal and problem-solving skills in dynamic, fast-paced environments. Managed front-of-house operations, team coordination, and customer engagement, demonstrating adaptability and leadership.
highlights: Led front-of-house operations, ensuring high-quality customer service and efficiency.
Trained and mentored new employees, improving team performance and cohesion.
Revamped menu offerings and implemented a recipe cost analysis system to enhance profitability.
